page.title: 05LIFESTYLES
page.content:
Sadly our area is not an area full of department stores, so most fashionable clothes have to be obtained from outside our area. The majority of the shops are small with only the basic styles. Despite this mods and punks go to other areas to get their clothes. In Colwyn Bay there is an annual mod rally were mods have a get together. Our area is very mountainous and therefore there are no large venues where well known bands can come and perform.Even the theatres in the area are small and are unable to hold a large concert.The majority of people enjoy a rural lifestyles.So there is not much call for pop concerts anyway.
By Michael Gavriel
